title: Much in a little, or, An abstract of Mr. Baxters plain Scripture-proof for infants church-membership or baptism with a few notes upon the anti-queries of T.G. / by the same hand that wrote the Fifty queries.
author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.
notes: Attributed to John Barret. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
